import React from "react" import { useState } from "react/cjs/react.production.min" export default function Meme(){ const [memeImage, setMemeImage] = React.useState('') function getMemeImage() { const memesArray = memesData.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) const memeImage = memesArray[randomNumber].url setMemeImage(prevMeme => memeImage) } return (
) }
